attributes.action: pay Afghan farmers to produce alternative crops to heroin-producing opium; as much as they receive for the opium
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: According to details given in Radio Times, about a play dealing with the issue, the only current alternatives for these farmers are to continue producing the opium or turn to the Taliban as their only other means of survival/income.  This is obviously appalling; I feel my suggestion offers the only way out for them.
